name: search-domain
title: Search Domain
description: Search domain names quickly with instant availability check
author: hasanakay

commands.name: search-domain
commands.title: Search Domain
commands.description: Search domain names quickly with instant availability check
commands.subtitle: Domain Checker

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
